table.value: CREATE TABLE `wb_attachment` ( `id` int(4) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `pid` int(4) NOT NULL, `tag` varchar(225) NOT NULL, `key` char(6) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `type` char(15) NOT NULL, `size` int(10) NOT NULL, `extension` char(5) NOT NULL, `savepath` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `savename` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `hash` char(32) NOT NULL, `info` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `other` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `orders` int(4) NOT NULL, `url` varchar(225) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT
